oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Probiotische Aspekte des Auftretens der Ackerkratzdistel (CIRSIUM ARVENSE (L.) SCOP.) im Lichte eines ganzheitlichen Forschungsansatzes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Heilmann, Hartmut
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Even if an existing agricultural holistic production system works without specific measures of control of CIRSIUM ARVENSE (L.) SCOP. scientific questions of pedogene probiotic aspects are left to be answered. Changes in soil structure and pH-Value are not as much due to the conditions of soil but depend on the influences of the Creeping thistle. Thistle growth, rhizome dormancy and subterranean embryogeny depend on microbial conditions in the soil which should be controlled.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Heilmann, Hartmut (2011) Probiotische Aspekte des Auftretens der Ackerkratzdistel (CIRSIUM ARVENSE (L.) SCOP.) im Lichte eines ganzheitlichen Forschungsansatzes. Poster at: 11. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Gießen, 15.-18. März 2011.
